snippet: The Talea Ensemble performed at this experimental arts center to an audience at roughly 6 percent of capacity, low enough to give most artistic directors panic attacks.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe Critic's Notebook submits that Curtis R Priem Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, NY, is apt venue for American premiere of Enno Poppe piece Speicher, performed by Talea Ensemble; notes that bold, almost uncomfortable, performance drew only 6 percent audience capacity but was successful in terms of pushing artistic boundaries.
lead_paragraph: The Talea Ensemble performed at this experimental arts center to an audience at roughly 6 percent of capacity, low enough to give most artistic directors panic attacks.

headline.print_headline: Shrugging Popularity to Promote Creative Liberty
headline.main: Empac Shrugs Popularity to Promote Creative Liberty in Troy, N.Y.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Priem, Curtis R, Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center
